name: Kitchenery
description: Kitchenery integrates cordless power solutions (transmitter/ receiver) + IoT capabilities into kitchen appliances. Co works with a leading induction cooktop company, has strong interest from RV OEM/Distributors and ha high volume Asian mfg for appliances.
